sentences.sContent: I don’t want to quit because I will get fat.
sentences.sContent_eng: I don’t want to quit because I will get fat.
sentences.sCn: 我不想戒烟，因为戒烟会让我发胖的。

sentences.sContent: But it’s just one of many “get fat” habits that can be turned into a “slim-down” habit, starting today.
sentences.sContent_eng: But it’s just one of many “get fat” habits that can be turned into a “slim-down” habit, starting today.
sentences.sCn: 但这只是诸多可以转变成让你苗条而却让你发胖的饮食习惯之一。

sentences.sContent: If your friends and family get fat, chances are you will too, researchers report in a new study that suggests obesity is "socially contagious" and can spread easily from person to person.
sentences.sContent_eng: If your friends and family get fat, chances are you will too, researchers report in a new study that suggests obesity is "socially contagious" and can spread easily from person to person.
sentences.sCn: 如果你的朋友和家人发胖了，你也得小心了！ 一项最新研究表明，肥胖具有"社会传染性"，很容易在人与人之间传播。
